en: Daddy Pig is taking the family for a drive in the country.
zh: 猪爸爸要带全家人开车在乡村玩。
来吧！大家都准备好了吗？
是的，猪爸爸，我们准备好了。

en: You should see how messy it is inside!
zh: 你应该看看里边有多乱。

en: Look at all this rubbish! Newspapers!
zh: 看看这些垃圾！一推报纸！

en: We must clean the car before we go for a drive.
zh: 在我们出发之前，必须把车子清洁干净！

en: Oh, right you are, Mummy Pig.
Mummy, can we help to clean the car?
zh: 妈妈，我们能帮忙洗车吗？

en: Daddy Pig has some warm soapy water to wash the car.
zh: 猪爸爸取了些温肥皂水用来洗车。

en: Daddy pig is washing the roof.
Mummy Pig is washing the bonnet.
George wants to wash the windows.
Poor George. Let me help you.
zh: 可怜的乔治，让我来帮你。

en: Oh, dear! George has dropped his sponge in a muddy puddle.
zh: 哦，糟糕！乔治把海绵掉在泥坑里了。

en: George, you're making the car all muddy again!
zh: 乔治，你又把车子弄脏了！

en: I will wash the mud off.
Oh, dear! Peppa has thrown the muddy water all over the car.
zh: 哦，糟糕！佩奇用泥水把车洒了个遍！

en: We can use the garden hose to clean it off.
zh: 我们用花园的水管把它冲干净。

en: Yes! Yes! Can I hold the hose?
zh: 没错，没错。我可以拿着水管吗？

en: Peppa holds the hose and Daddy Pig turns on the water.
zh: 佩奇拿着水管，猪爸爸打开了水龙头。

en: Argh! Daddy Pig! Please turn off the water!
zh: 啊！猪爸爸，请把水龙头关上。

en: At least the car has been washed.
You go and dry yourseIves while I polish the car.
zh: 你们去擦干衣服，我来擦亮车。

en: Daddy Pig is polishing the car so well,he can see his face in it.
zh: 猪爸爸把车擦得很干净，可以映出他的脸。
真是一辆可爱，闪闪发光的车。

en: Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.
zh: 没错，我可是这方面的专家。

en: I hope you will all keep this car clean today.
zh: 我希望你们一直能让车保持干净。

en: Mummy, now you've made the car all muddy again.
zh: 妈妈，现在可是你把车子弄脏了。
